metadata.titleEn: One belt, one road, key node area,inter-annual change process data of built-up areas (1985-2018)
metadata.titleCn: “一带一路”关键节点区域建成区年际变化过程数据（1985-2018）
metadata.description: The change of urban built-up area reflects the development of the city, so the information extraction of the change process of built-up area is an important prerequisite for the study of urban development and regional economy. This data set contains the annual change information of the built-up area of key nodes from 1985 to 2018, with a resolution of 30m. Using the combined method of supervision classification and time consistency check, the three key nodes of Hambantota, Yangon and Dhaka are used as the study area to determine the change from the non-built-up area to the built-up area. Pixels in built-up areas are defined as more than 50% impervious. The year of transition (from non-built-up area to built-up area) can be identified from the pixel value, ranging from 34 (year: 1985) to 1 (year: 2018). For example, the built-up area in 1990 can be displayed with a pixel value greater than 29. After monotonous conversion from non-built-up area to built-up area, the data set is consistent in time.
metadata.descriptionCn: 城市建成区的变化反映了城市的发展情况，因此对建成区变化过程的信息提取是研究城市发展和区域经济的重要前提。该数据集包含1985 年至 2018 年关键节点建成区表面积的年变化信息，分辨率为 30m。 使用监督分类和时间一致性检查的组合方法，以汉班托塔、仰光和达卡三个关键节点为研究区域，确定从非建成区到建成区的变化。 建成区像素定义为 50% 以上不透水。 发生转变的年份（从非建成区到建成区）可以从像素值中识别，范围从34（年份：1985）到1（年份：2018）。 例如，1990 年的建成区可以显示为像素值大于 29。 在从非建成区到建成区单调转换之后，该数据集在时间上是一致的。
metadata.instructions: In .tif format, can be opened and analysed in ARCGIS and ENVI softwares.

background: Artiﬁcial impervious areas are predominant indicators of human settlements. Timely, accurate, and frequent information on artiﬁcial impervious areas is critical to understanding the process of urbanization and land use/cover change, as well as of their impacts on the environment and biodiversity. The change of global artiﬁcial impervious area (GAIA) is a critical indicator for understanding the impact of global urbanization on human society and the environment. Artiﬁcial impervious areas are mainly man-made structures that are composed of any material that impedes or prevents natural inﬁltration of water into the soil. As an important proxy to built-up areas in the world, artiﬁcial impervious areas play a critical role in controlling the ﬂows of energy and materials and reﬂecting various levels of human activities. The rapid urban growth worldwide has signiﬁcant local and tele-connected impacts on biodiversity loss, agricultural production, and environmental quality, all of which ﬁnally inﬂuence human health and well-being. Although studies of mapping urban built-up areas and artiﬁcial impervious areas using satellite observations started more than four decades ago, earlier efforts were mainly made at the local scale. Since 2005, the advent of freely accessible satellite data made it possible to map urban extent and artiﬁcial impervious areas at the global scale. Despite many existing efforts in mapping GAIA, annual maps covering a relatively long period of time (i.e., more than 30 years) do not exist. In fact, accurate annual global land cover information including GAIA is needed in global climate change studies.
research objective: The purpose of this research was to develop a 34-year long annual GAIA using the full archive of Landsat data from 1985 to 2018.
challenges: Our previous studies suggest the mapping performance in arid and semi-arid regions is relatively poor due to the highly confusing spectral information between the artiﬁcial impervious area and the surrounding bare lands, resulting in an over commission of artiﬁcial impervious areas in dryland regions.
methods: We developed an automatic mapping procedure on the Google Earth Engine (GEE) platform to implement the planetary-scale mapping of annual artiﬁcial impervious areas at a 30-m resolution from 1985 to 2018. Therefore, in this research, we divided the whole world into arid areas and non-arid areas according to the global biome map. For non-arid areas, we used the same approach as in our previous studies. In arid regions, we developed an improved algorithm by including additional constraints to mitigate the overestimation caused by spectral confusion between impervious areas and bare lands. To improve the mapping eﬃciency on the GEE, we divided the whole world into 583 geographical grids (3.5º×3.5°), of which 155 grids contain arid biomes. The mapping procedures were implemented in all grids, using the full archive of Landsat time series images.
dataset: All Landsat Thematic Mapper (TM), Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+), and Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI) data acquired in different years were collected and processed for mapping of artificial impervious areas. Training samples of the impervious area are needed when applying the “Exclusion-Inclusion” algorithm. These sample units (i.e., around 100 per grid) were collected from earlier Landsat images (i.e., near or around the start year of 1985) in reference with higher resolution images in Google Earth; thus they can be spatially and temporally extended to enrich the sample size and applied to subsequent years.
findings: Our results indicate that the GAIA reached 797,076 km2 in 2018, which is 1.5 times more than that in 1990. China and the United States (US) rank among the top two in artiﬁcial impervious area, accounting for approximately 50% of the world's total in 2018. The artiﬁcial impervious area of China surpassed that of the US in 2015.
backgroundCn: 人工不透水区域是人类定居点的主要指标。及时、准确和频繁的信息关于人工不透水区域对于理解城市化和土地利用/覆盖变化的过程，以及它们对环境和生物多样性的影响至关重要。全球人工不透水区域（GAIA）的变化是理解全球城市化对人类社会和环境影响的关键指标。人工不透水区域主要是由任何阻碍或防止水自然渗透到土壤中的材料构成的人造结构。作为全球建筑区域的重要代理，人工不透水区域在控制能量和物质的流动以及反映各种水平的人类活动方面发挥着关键作用。全球范围内的快速城市增长对生物多样性丧失、农业生产和环境质量产生了显著的局部和远程影响，所有这些最终都会影响人类的健康和福祉。尽管对城市建筑区域和人工不透水区域的卫星观测映射研究始于四十多年前，但早期的努力主要集中在地方尺度。自2005年以来，免费获取的卫星数据的出现使得在全球尺度上映射城市范围和人工不透水区域成为可能。尽管已有许多关于GAIA的映射努力，但覆盖相对较长时间（即超过30年）的年度地图仍然不存在。事实上，全球气候变化研究需要准确的年度全球土地覆盖信息，包括GAIA。
research objectiveCn: 本研究的目的是利用1985年至2018年的完整Landsat数据档案开发一个为期34年的年度GAIA。
challengesCn: 我们的先前研究表明，干旱和半干旱地区的制图性能相对较差，因为人工不透水区与周围裸土地之间的光谱信息高度混淆，导致干旱地区人工不透水区的过度委托。
methodsCn: 我们在Google Earth Engine（GEE）平台上开发了一种自动映射程序，以实现1985年至2018年间以30米分辨率进行的全球范围内人工不透水区域的年度映射。因此，在本研究中，我们根据全球生物群落图将整个世界划分为干旱地区和非干旱地区。对于非干旱地区，我们采用了与之前研究相同的方法。在干旱地区，我们通过增加额外约束条件来开发改进的算法，以减轻由于不透水区域与裸土地之间的光谱混淆而导致的过度估计。为了提高在GEE上的映射效率，我们将整个世界划分为583个地理网格（3.5º×3.5°），其中155个网格包含干旱生物群落。映射程序在所有网格中实施，使用了Landsat时间序列图像的完整档案。
datasetCn: 所有的Landsat主题测量仪（TM）、增强主题测量仪加（ETM+）和Landsat 8操作陆地成像仪（OLI）在不同年份获取的数据被收集和处理，用于人工不透水区域的制图。在应用“排除-包含”算法时，需要不透水区域的训练样本。这些样本单元（即每个网格约100个）是从早期的Landsat影像（即1985年左右的起始年份）中收集的，并参考了Google Earth中的高分辨率影像；因此，它们可以在空间和时间上进行扩展，以丰富样本量，并应用于后续年份。
findingsCn: 我们的结果表明，GAIA在2018年达到了797,076平方公里，是1990年的1.5倍。中国和美国排名前两位，人工不透水面积约占2018年全球总量的50%。中国的人工不透水面积在2015年超过了美国。

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the automatic mapping procedure developed on the Google Earth Engine platform accurately map annual artificial impervious areas at a 30-m resolution from 1985 to 2018?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在Google Earth Engine平台上开发的自动映射程序能否准确地以30米分辨率从1985年到2018年映射年度人工不透水区域？

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the method used for mapping artificial impervious areas involve the use of the full archive of Landsat data?
Verification.QuestionCn: 用于映射人工不透水区域的方法是否涉及使用完整的Landsat数据档案？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the mapping performance in arid and semi-arid regions relatively poor due to confusing spectral information between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands?
Verification.QuestionCn: 由于人工不透水区域与周围裸露土地之间的光谱信息混淆，干旱和半干旱地区的映射性能是否相对较差？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Which platform is more commonly used for mapping annual artificial impervious areas, Google Earth Engine (GEE) or a different platform?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 哪个平台更常用于绘制年度人工不透水区域，Google Earth Engine（GEE）还是其他平台？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: In arid regions, are additional constraints or standard mapping procedures more effective in improving the accuracy of artificial impervious area mapping?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，额外的约束或标准映射程序在提高人工不透水区域映射的准确性方面是否更有效？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What are the main challenges in mapping artificial impervious areas in arid and semi-arid regions?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，绘制人工不透水区域的主要挑战是什么？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can training samples for mapping artificial impervious areas be collected from, and how are they utilized?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 人工不透水区域的训练样本可以从哪里收集，如何利用这些样本？

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge encountered in mapping artificial impervious areas in arid regions?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区绘制人工不透水区域时遇到的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in mapping artificial impervious areas in arid regions is the highly confusing spectral information between the artificial impervious area and the surrounding bare lands, which results in overestimation of impervious areas.
Example.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，映射人工不透水区域的一个挑战是人工不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱信息高度混淆，这导致对不透水区域的高估。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you illustrate an example of how a dataset on artificial impervious areas might be expanded or refined over time?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否举例说明如何随着时间的推移扩展或细化关于人工不透水区域的数据集？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset can be expanded or refined by collecting and processing Landsat Thematic Mapper (TM), Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+), and Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI) data from different years, and using training samples collected from earlier images to apply to subsequent years, thereby enriching the sample size.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个数据集可以通过收集和处理不同年份的Landsat主题映射仪（TM）、增强主题映射仪（ETM+）和Landsat 8操作陆地成像仪（OLI）数据来扩展或精炼，并利用从早期图像中收集的训练样本应用于后续年份，从而丰富样本大小。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the key features of the automatic mapping procedure used for data collection on urban built-up areas?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 自动映射程序用于城市建筑区域数据收集的关键特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: planetary-scale mapping, annual artificial impervious areas, 30-m resolution, 1985 to 2018, Google Earth Engine platform, arid and non-arid regions, improved algorithms, 583 geographical grids
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 行星尺度制图，年度人工不透水区域，30米分辨率，1985年至2018年，Google Earth Engine平台，干旱和非干旱地区，改进的算法，583个地理网格。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the training samples used in the mapping of artificial impervious areas?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 定义用于人工不透水区域映射的训练样本的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 100 sample units per grid, referenced with higher resolution images in Google Earth, spatial and temporal extension
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 每个网格100个样本单元，与Google Earth中的高分辨率图像进行参考，空间和时间扩展。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many geographical grids were used to implement the mapping procedures of annual artificial impervious areas on the Google Earth Engine platform?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在Google Earth Engine平台上实施年度人工不透水区域的映射程序时使用了多少个地理网格？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'Exclusion-Inclusion' algorithm used in the context of mapping artificial impervious areas?
Definition.QuestionCn: “排除-包含”算法在人工不透水区域映射中的应用是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The 'Exclusion-Inclusion' algorithm is a methodology used for mapping artificial impervious areas, where training samples of the impervious area are collected to apply the algorithm. These sample units are initially gathered from earlier satellite images and can be spatially and temporally extended to enrich the sample size for subsequent years.
Definition.AnswerCn: “排除-包含”算法是一种用于映射人工不透水区域的方法，收集不透水区域的训练样本以应用该算法。这些样本单元最初是从早期的卫星图像中收集的，并可以在空间和时间上扩展，以丰富后续年份的样本量。

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'supervised classification' mean in the context of urban development data analysis?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在城市发展数据分析的背景下，“监督分类”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of urban development data analysis, 'supervised classification' refers to a technique that involves using labeled data to train a model to differentiate between various classes or categories. This method is part of a combination approach used to determine changes from non-built-up to built-up areas in urban studies.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在城市发展数据分析的背景下，“监督分类”指的是一种使用标记数据来训练模型以区分不同类别或类别的技术。这种方法是用于确定城市研究中非建筑区域到建筑区域变化的组合方法的一部分。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'spectral confusion' in remote sensing of artificial impervious areas?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感中，人工不透水区域的“光谱混淆”是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In remote sensing, 'spectral confusion' refers to the difficulty in distinguishing between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands due to similar spectral characteristics, particularly in arid and semi-arid regions. This confusion can lead to overestimation of impervious areas in dryland regions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在遥感中，“光谱混淆”指的是由于人工不透水区域和周围裸土地具有相似的光谱特征，导致难以区分它们，特别是在干旱和半干旱地区。这种混淆可能导致对干旱地区不透水区域的过高估计。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the method of mapping urban built-up areas using satellite observations compare to the automatic mapping procedure developed on the Google Earth Engine platform for artificial impervious areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 使用卫星观测映射城市建筑区域的方法与在Google Earth Engine平台上开发的自动映射人工不透水区域的程序相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Mapping urban built-up areas using satellite observations traditionally involved efforts at a local scale, while the automatic mapping procedure on the Google Earth Engine platform facilitates planetary-scale mapping of annual artificial impervious areas at a 30-meter resolution from 1985 to 2018, offering a global perspective.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 传统上，使用卫星观测映射城市建筑区域的工作主要集中在地方尺度，而在Google Earth Engine平台上，自动映射程序能够以30米的分辨率对1985年至2018年的年度人工不透水区域进行行星尺度的映射，提供了全球视角。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in challenges faced when mapping artificial impervious areas in arid versus non-arid regions?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区与非干旱地区绘制人工不透水区域时面临的挑战有哪些不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: In arid regions, the mapping performance is relatively poor due to spectral confusion between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands, necessitating additional constraints to mitigate overestimation. In contrast, non-arid regions do not face this challenge, allowing the use of approaches from previous studies without these additional constraints.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，由于人工不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱混淆，映射性能相对较差，因此需要额外的约束来减轻过度估计。相比之下，非干旱地区则没有面临这一挑战，可以使用之前研究中的方法，而不需要这些额外的约束。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in differentiating artificial impervious areas from natural landscapes in arid and semi-arid regions, and how can these be addressed in data collection methodologies?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，区分人工不透水区域与自然景观可能会面临哪些挑战，以及如何在数据收集方法中解决这些问题？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: In arid and semi-arid regions, the spectral similarity between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands poses a challenge, often leading to overestimation. This can be addressed by incorporating additional constraints and developing improved algorithms that can better differentiate between these features, thus enhancing the accuracy of mapping impervious areas.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，人工不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱相似性构成了挑战，常常导致过度估计。可以通过引入额外约束和开发改进算法来解决这一问题，从而更好地区分这些特征，提高不透水区域映射的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the overestimation of artificial impervious areas in arid and semi-arid regions when using satellite data for mapping?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用卫星数据进行映射时，导致干旱和半干旱地区人工不透水区域过度估计的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The mapping performance in arid and semi-arid regions is relatively poor due to the highly confusing spectral information between the artificial impervious area and the surrounding bare lands, resulting in an over commission of artificial impervious areas in dryland regions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，映射性能相对较差，因为人工不透水区与周围裸土地之间的光谱信息高度混淆，导致干旱地区人工不透水区的过度误判。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is the development of a long-term annual global dataset of artificial impervious areas crucial for global climate change studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 为什么开发一个长期的全球人工不透水区域年度数据集对于全球气候变化研究至关重要？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Accurate annual global land cover information, including global artificial impervious areas (GAIA), is needed in global climate change studies to understand the impact of global urbanization on human society and the environment.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 准确的年度全球土地覆盖信息，包括全球人工不透水区域（GAIA），在全球气候变化研究中是必要的，以了解全球城市化对人类社会和环境的影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What challenges does the spectral confusion between artificial impervious areas and surrounding environments pose in mapping efforts, and how can these be addressed?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 人工不透水区域与周围环境之间的光谱混淆在制图工作中带来了哪些挑战，以及如何解决这些问题？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The spectral confusion between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands in arid regions causes overestimation of impervious areas. This challenge can be addressed by including additional constraints in the mapping algorithm to mitigate the overestimation caused by spectral confusion.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区，人工不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱混淆导致对不透水区域的高估。通过在映射算法中加入额外的约束，可以解决这一挑战，从而减轻由于光谱混淆造成的高估问题。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the consequences of using a combination of supervised classification and time consistency checks on the accuracy of urban built-up area mapping?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用监督分类和时间一致性检查的组合对城市建筑区域映射的准确性有什么影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of a combination of supervised classification and time consistency checks helps in accurately determining changes from non-built-up to built-up areas, which reflects urban development effectively. It ensures temporal consistency in detecting changes across years, thereby improving the reliability of urban area mapping over time.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用监督分类和时间一致性检查的组合有助于准确确定非建筑区到建筑区的变化，这有效反映了城市发展。它确保了跨年度检测变化的时间一致性，从而提高了城市区域映射的可靠性。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential effects of including additional constraints in mapping algorithms on the accuracy of impervious area identification in arid regions?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，增加约束条件在映射算法中对不透水区域识别的准确性可能产生的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Including additional constraints in mapping algorithms for arid regions can mitigate overestimation caused by spectral confusion between impervious areas and bare lands, thereby improving mapping accuracy. This adjustment addresses the challenge of distinguishing between similar spectral signatures, leading to more precise identification of impervious surfaces in these challenging environments.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区的制图算法中加入额外约束可以减轻由于不透水区域与裸土地之间的光谱混淆所导致的过度估计，从而提高制图准确性。这一调整解决了区分相似光谱特征的挑战，使得在这些具有挑战性的环境中更精确地识别不透水表面成为可能。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it significant to address the mapping performance challenges in arid and semi-arid regions when creating datasets of artificial impervious areas?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在创建人工不透水区域的数据集时，为什么解决干旱和半干旱地区的映射性能挑战是重要的？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Addressing the mapping performance challenges in arid and semi-arid regions is significant because of the highly confusing spectral information between artificial impervious areas and surrounding bare lands, which results in overestimation of impervious areas. This needs to be mitigated for accurate mapping.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 解决干旱和半干旱地区的制图性能挑战是重要的，因为人工不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱信息高度混淆，这导致对不透水区域的高估。需要对此进行缓解，以实现准确的制图。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in the automatic mapping of artificial impervious areas using satellite data on the Google Earth Engine platform?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在Google Earth Engine平台上，使用卫星数据自动映射人工不透水区域的程序步骤包括以下哪几个方面？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedure involves developing an automatic mapping process on the Google Earth Engine (GEE) platform for planetary-scale mapping of annual artificial impervious areas at a 30-m resolution from 1985 to 2018. The world is divided into arid and non-arid areas according to the global biome map, and different approaches are applied based on these categories. For arid regions, additional constraints are included to mitigate overestimation caused by spectral confusion. The world is divided into 583 geographical grids (3.5º×3.5°), and mapping procedures are implemented using the full archive of Landsat time series images.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 该程序涉及在谷歌地球引擎（GEE）平台上开发自动映射过程，以实现1985年至2018年间以30米分辨率进行的全球范围内人工不透水区域的年度映射。根据全球生物群落图，世界被划分为干旱和非干旱地区，并根据这些类别应用不同的方法。对于干旱地区，增加了额外的约束，以减轻由于光谱混淆导致的过度估计。世界被划分为583个地理网格（3.5º×3.5°），并使用Landsat时间序列图像的完整档案实施映射程序。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological improvements are made to mitigate the challenges of mapping artificial impervious areas in arid and semi-arid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 为减轻在干旱和半干旱地区绘制人工不透水区域的挑战，采取了哪些方法论改进？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: In arid and semi-arid regions, an improved algorithm is developed by including additional constraints to address the challenge of spectral confusion between impervious areas and surrounding bare lands. This helps mitigate the overestimation of artificial impervious areas in dryland regions, enhancing the mapping accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，开发了一种改进的算法，通过增加额外的约束来解决不透水区域与周围裸土地之间的光谱混淆问题。这有助于减轻干旱地区人工不透水区域的过度估计，提高了制图准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How does the division of the world into arid and non-arid areas enhance the accuracy of mapping artificial impervious areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 将世界划分为干旱和非干旱地区如何提高人工不透水区域映射的准确性？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The division of the world into arid and non-arid areas enhances the accuracy by allowing for the development of an improved algorithm in arid regions, where additional constraints are included to mitigate the overestimation caused by spectral confusion between impervious areas and bare lands.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 将世界划分为干旱和非干旱地区可以提高准确性，因为这允许在干旱地区开发改进的算法，其中包含额外的约束，以减轻由于不透水区域和裸土地之间的光谱混淆而导致的过度估计。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What methods are employed to ensure the spatial and temporal extension of training samples for mapping artificial impervious areas?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了确保人工不透水区域映射的训练样本在空间和时间上的扩展，采用了哪些方法？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Training samples of the impervious area are collected from earlier Landsat images near the start year of 1985, in reference with higher resolution images in Google Earth, allowing them to be spatially and temporally extended to enrich the sample size and applied to subsequent years.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 在1985年初，收集了早期Landsat影像中的不透水区域训练样本，并参考了Google Earth中的高分辨率影像，从而使样本在空间和时间上得以扩展，以丰富样本量，并应用于后续年份。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the mapping performance in arid and semi-arid regions be relatively poor when using existing data collection methods for artificial impervious areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，使用现有的数据收集方法对人工不透水区域的映射性能可能相对较差的原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Mapping performance in arid and semi-arid regions may be poor due to the highly confusing spectral information between the artificial impervious area and the surrounding bare lands, which results in an over commission of artificial impervious areas in dryland regions.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 在干旱和半干旱地区，映射性能可能较差，因为人工不透水区与周围裸土地之间的光谱信息高度混淆，这导致在干旱地区对人工不透水区的过度识别。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why is there a need for accurate annual global land cover information, including artificial impervious areas, in global climate change studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 为什么在全球气候变化研究中需要准确的年度全球土地覆盖信息，包括人工不透水区域？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Accurate annual global land cover information, including artificial impervious areas, is needed in global climate change studies to understand the impact of global urbanization on human society and the environment, as well as to provide critical indicators for understanding the process of urbanization and land use/cover change.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 准确的年度全球土地覆盖信息，包括人工不透水区域，对于全球气候变化研究至关重要，以理解全球城市化对人类社会和环境的影响，并提供关键指标以理解城市化和土地使用/覆盖变化的过程。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise when developing an automatic mapping procedure to measure annual changes in artificial impervious areas?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在开发自动映射程序以测量人工不透水区域的年度变化时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Challenges in developing an automatic mapping procedure to measure annual changes in artificial impervious areas can include mitigating overestimation caused by spectral confusion, especially in arid regions, and efficiently processing large volumes of satellite data across different geographical grids.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 开发自动映射程序以测量人工不透水区域的年度变化所面临的挑战包括减轻由于光谱混淆造成的高估，特别是在干旱地区，以及高效处理跨不同地理网格的大量卫星数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in accurately mapping artificial impervious areas in arid regions using satellite data?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区使用卫星数据准确绘制人工不透水区域的潜在挑战有哪些？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The potential challenges in accurately mapping artificial impervious areas in arid regions using satellite data include the highly confusing spectral information between the artificial impervious area and the surrounding bare lands. This can result in an over commission of artificial impervious areas in dryland regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区使用卫星数据准确绘制人工不透水区的潜在挑战包括人工不透水区与周围裸土地之间高度混淆的光谱信息。这可能导致在干旱地区对人工不透水区的过度识别。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How effective do you find the use of the Google Earth Engine platform for planetary-scale mapping of urban built-up areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 您认为使用Google Earth Engine平台进行行星尺度的城市建筑区域映射的效果如何？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The use of the Google Earth Engine platform for planetary-scale mapping is considered effective as it allows the implementation of mapping procedures at a 30-m resolution from 1985 to 2018. It facilitates processing large volumes of Landsat data efficiently by dividing the world into geographical grids and applying improved algorithms in arid regions.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 谷歌地球引擎平台在行星尺度映射中的使用被认为是有效的，因为它允许在1985年至2018年间以30米的分辨率实施映射程序。它通过将世界划分为地理网格并在干旱地区应用改进的算法，能够高效处理大量的Landsat数据。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: Could the inclusion of higher resolution imagery in the training sample collection enhance the mapping of artificial impervious areas?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在训练样本收集中加入更高分辨率的影像是否能增强人工不透水区域的映射？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Yes, the inclusion of higher resolution imagery in the training sample collection could enhance the mapping of artificial impervious areas, as it provides more accurate reference points for comparison. This helps in spatially and temporally extending the sample size and applying it to subsequent years, which could improve the overall accuracy of the mapping process.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 是的，在训练样本集合中包含更高分辨率的影像可以增强人工不透水区域的映射，因为它提供了更准确的参考点进行比较。这有助于在空间和时间上扩展样本量，并将其应用于后续年份，从而提高映射过程的整体准确性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the mapping of artificial impervious areas could be accomplished on a global scale given the spectral confusion in arid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何在全球范围内实现人工不透水区域的映射，因为在干旱地区存在光谱混淆。
Assertion.AnswerEn: To address the spectral confusion in arid regions, an improved algorithm with additional constraints was developed to mitigate overestimation. The world was divided into arid and non-arid areas, and the mapping procedures were implemented using the full archive of Landsat time series images, leveraging the Google Earth Engine platform.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 为了应对干旱地区的光谱混淆，开发了一种改进的算法，增加了额外的约束以减轻过度估计。世界被划分为干旱和非干旱区域，并利用谷歌地球引擎平台实施了使用Landsat时间序列图像的映射程序。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how training samples for these artificial impervious areas are accurately collected and extended over time.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定这些人工不透水区域的训练样本是如何准确收集和随时间延续的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Training samples of the impervious area were collected using earlier Landsat images and were referenced with higher resolution images in Google Earth. These sample units, around 100 per grid, are spatially and temporally extended to enrich the sample size and are applied to subsequent years.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用早期的Landsat影像收集了不透水区域的训练样本，并通过Google Earth中的高分辨率影像进行了参考。这些样本单位每个网格约100个，空间和时间上进行了扩展，以丰富样本量，并应用于后续年份。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please outline the process of selecting and preparing training samples for mapping artificial impervious areas using Landsat data.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请概述使用Landsat数据绘制人工不透水面的训练样本选择与准备过程。
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在1985年左右，收集了早期Landsat影像中的不透水区域的训练样本，并参考了Google Earth中的高分辨率影像。每个地理网格大约收集100个样本单元，并在空间和时间上进行扩展，以丰富样本量，以便应用于后续年份。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please evaluate the effectiveness of using Landsat data in mapping the global artificial impervious area over multiple decades and discuss any significant findings.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请评估使用Landsat数据在多个十年内绘制全球人工不透水区域的有效性，并讨论任何重要发现。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Landsat data, including Thematic Mapper (TM), Enhanced Thematic Mapper Plus (ETM+), and Landsat 8 Operational Land Imager (OLI), are effective in mapping the global artificial impervious area over 34 years. A significant finding is that the global artificial impervious area reached 797,076 km2 in 2018, 1.5 times more than in 1990, with China and the US accounting for approximately 50% of the world's total in 2018.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: Landsat数据，包括主题映射仪（TM）、增强主题映射仪（ETM+）和Landsat 8操作土地成像仪（OLI），在34年内有效地映射了全球人工不透水区域。一个重要发现是，全球人工不透水区域在2018年达到了797,076平方公里，比1990年增加了1.5倍，其中中国和美国在2018年占全球总量的约50%。
